title: Petition to make Level 7 Mastery of champions be different for each one
body:
Even though it will hardly become reality, you can now throw all your ideas here so that there isn't a new topic every week for different champ.

I want Level 7 Mastery for Vel'koz to be Graduate of Advanced Disintegrational Sciences (GOADS).

Yes. Homophobia is welcome on the Boards.

Society is slowly turning "%%%got" into less homophobic, and more of a general term to describe idiots, jerks, nuisances, and loudmouths. If we stop labeling it as homophobic we might actually get somewhere without people getting hurt and without judging everyone who uses a word differently.
Or maybe if people stop using homophobic terms as a generic terms people might actually listen to what you have to say.

> [{quoted}](name=DeathBot666,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i1F8aKxs,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2016-09-17T22:52:59.265+0000)
>
> Or maybe if people stop using homophobic terms as a generic terms people might actually listen to what you have to say.

disagree, if you can only focus on what you perceive as offensive then your pretty much a little bitch. you should be able to look at what they have to say, approve/disapprove of it, then go on to those issues, not the other way around because then there would be no progress.

I'm not sure what that has to do with people no longer being hurt or judging each other, i can disregard a hurtful statement, but it'd be better to work so that these statements aren't confused for something more serious. Perhaps it's better if we hide though, I can't say for sure what society as a whole can benefit from more, no one really can, or at least no one here.
Your sentence is poorly worded then.  It's coming off as saying "It's not a homophobic term, so stop calling it one and listen to what the guy says."  Sorry if I misinterpreted that.
I have a tendency to word things poorly, very sorry about that. Hope there's no hard feelings between us, have a good day.

Except that people are homophobic, especially less-educated ones or just a lot of children on the internet.

I may go around telling i'm gay, doesn't mean people will take it in a good way. Also, there is a reason why that thing got removed. 

I reported it.

(I'm not gay btw)

I like how the boards can tell you what you can and cannot agree with as person and if you dont agree with it dont share it. day F%%% or G%% and you automatically insulting some one some where where as if you say cancer or retard you on only offending some one half the time

You've no proof other than the ASSUMPTION that the word "%%%got" was used in a homophobic way, and it's very ignorant of you to say that people who aren't intelligent are inherently bigoted. Some people use and see words differently, it isn't your place to say what he meant. You are, however, well within your rights to take offense and report things you find offensive.

> [{quoted}](name=TsunamiWave22,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=i1F8aKxs,comment-id=00000001000000030000,timestamp=2016-09-18T00:58:47.825+0000)
>
> You've no proof other than the ASSUMPTION that the word "%%%got" was used in a homophobic way, and it's very ignorant of you to say that people who aren't intelligent are inherently bigoted. Some people use and see words differently, it isn't your place to say what he meant. You are, however, well within your rights to take offense and report things you find offensive.

i agree with you so much. seeing his post kinda pissed me off a bit. he can take offense and all, but since i cant see the originally post, i can only really assume from all of the other posts that it may not of been done in a homophobic way, but just perceived as such.
